General.Name: Beijing Lanxum Tech Co
General.Description: Doushen (Beijing) Education & Technology INC. provides education, software, and information security services in China. The company was formerly known as Beijing Lanxum Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Doushen (Beijing) Education & Technology INC. in August 2020. Doushen (Beijing) Education & Technology INC. was founded in 1999 and is based in Beijing, China.
